basic.description: This course introduces quantum mechanics and molecular simulation as engineering tools for the understanding and design of molecular structure and properties. It is aimed at providing an overview of the principles of quantum mechanical theory and molecular simulation with strong emphasis on applications to engineering problems. Key mathematical concepts will be discussed and applied using state-of-the-art modeling software. (0/21/0/21/0)
basic.subject: CHEM
basic.title: Quantum Mech/Molecular Sim

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of (CHEE210 or CHEM244) and (MATH225 or MATH226) and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
